title: Omg guys wtf do I do?
body:
I was texting one my side hoes and I was flirting and then I got a text from my mum and I got confused and sent my mum a doodle picture, she hasn't looked at me since and she refuses to look at me.

Will she ever forget or will she never look at me again and should I just move out?

replies.body: another post said your 21? y u still living there in the first place thats right the average age for an aussie "man" to leave home is in is 30's nowadays... what a funny world it became to be
Unless yo mama has glasses or maybe even a microscope you don't need to worry.
What you should do is take a picture of your doodle completely frosted in ice and ask her. "How do I make it look like the first picture again." Confirmed amazing idea.
Explain to your mum that you meant to send her the dick pic and that you love her.
Eh, the funny thing here is people actually believe this crap.
Well that's what I thought about it after I finished reading...but  regardless it being real or fake it's still funny.
you should kys now sack boy. you far gone kunt lmao
